## Data archiving

From the final DMP:  

_"All data generated for FACE-IT will be stored either on the PANGAEA data portal, or an established institutionally
affiliated/supported data portal such as NPDC or GEM (but not limited to these two), for long-term storage and
maintenance."_

## Data archiving

- This is important because we want to avoid the EU from retaining the final 10% of funds  
- This is a point of discussion for everyone
